Package deco2800.thomas

Interface Tickable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTask, Enemy, EnemyPath, EnemyPeon, InventoryManager, KeyboardManager, MovementTask, NetworkManager, PathFindingService, Peon, PlayerPeon, TickableManager, Tree
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface Tickable
Allows Entities to be ticked at a constant rate allowing for AI and other tasks to occur.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void onTick​(long tick)
    On tick is called periodically (time dependant on the world settings).

  • Method Details

    • onTick

      void onTick​(long tick)
      On tick is called periodically (time dependant on the world settings).
      Parameters:
      tick - Current game tick
